fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.processors
Class VocabularyResolver

java.lang.Object
  fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.processors.VocabularyResolver

public class VocabularyResolver
extends Object

A VocabularyResolvert helps the retrieval and parsing of documents during a serialization or deserialization operation. It holds a reference to a local document for resolving local URIs and a map to cache externally resolved URIs. The local document is a DOM Document because the vocabulary resolution may happen while importing a document, that is while the document is not fully imported yet.

Author:
adenis

getDocumentsCache

public Map<URI,EmotionMLDocument> getDocumentsCache()
Returns the current documents cache. Any modifications on the given cache will be used by the resolver.

Returns:
the actual cache

Parameters:
document -

retrieveVocabulary

public Vocabulary retrieveVocabulary(URI uri)
                              throws EmotionMLException
Retrieves a Vocabulary with given URI. If the URI is local to a document, resolve it against the local document, else check first in the cache if the URI has been already resolved, eventually retrieve the document and parse it.

Parameters:
uri -
Returns:
null if not found
Throws:
EmotionMLException
